dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2934 IH: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the authority of the Advisory Committee on Homeless Veterans for five years.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Ted Lieu of California (for himself, Ms. Brownley of California, Mr. Takano, Mr. Murphy of Florida, Mr. Meeks, Ms. Norton, Mr. Honda, Mrs. Davis of California, Mr. Serrano, Mr. Quigley, Mr. Conyers, Mrs. Torres, Mr. Grijalva, Ms. Meng, Ms. Judy Chu of California, Mr. Israel, Mr. Al Green of Texas, and Mr. Nolan) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veteransâ€™ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the authority of the Advisory Committee on Homeless Veterans for five years.

section.header: Five-year extension of Advisory Committee on Homeless Veterans
section.text: Section 2066(d) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking December 31, 2015 and inserting December 31, 2020.
